subject: Add multi-user support
commitMessage:
Add multi-user support

The user/group "app" has been replaced with a new user/group "avahi".

Also:
+ set valid group tags
+ replace hardcoded paths with RPM macros
+ replace obsolete path /usr/etc with /etc
+ replace hard-coded name "avahi" with "%{name}" macro.

Bug-Tizen: PTREL-396
Change-Id: I1a959ed2b9145ba21fdc81e8f966bee7680f7b0b
Signed-off-by: Kévin THIERRY <kevin.thierry@open.eurogiciel.org>
